controls.label: Send frame no. to EyeLink
controls.tooltip:
If an eyelink is connected, then it will receive the number of each displayed frame as a msg event.
You can also see this information in the eyelink's status message box.
This option requires the installation of the OpenSesame EyeLink plugin and an established connection to the EyeLink.
